daddiu r2, r0, 1          -> 01100100000000100000000000000001 (0x64020001)
sd r2, a(r0)              -> 11111100000000100000000000000000 (0xFC020000)
daddiu r2, r0, 2          -> 01100100000000100000000000000010 (0x64020002)
sd r2, b(r0)              -> 11111100000000100000000000001000 (0xFC020008)
